item.text: “You are to make the altar of acacia wood, 7½ feet long, and 7½ feet wide; the altar is to be square, and its height is to be 4½ feet.

You are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> its four <st data-num="07161" class="">horns</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> its <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="06438" class="">corners</st>; its <st data-num="07161" class="">horns</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">part of</st> it,<n id="2" /> and you are to <st data-num="06823" class="">overlay</st> it with <st data-num="05178" class="">bronze</st>.

You are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> its <st data-num="05518" class="">pots</st> for the <st data-num="01878" class="">ashes</st>,<n id="1" /> its <st data-num="03257" class="">shovels</st>, its <st data-num="04219" class="">tossing bowls</st>,<n id="2" /> its <st data-num="04207" class="">meat hooks</st>, and its <st data-num="04289" class="">fire pans</st>—you are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st><n id="3" /> its <st data-num="03627" class="">utensils</st> of <st data-num="05178" class="">bronze</st>.

You are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> a <st data-num="04345" class="">grating</st><n id="1" /> for it, a <st data-num="04639 07568" class="">network</st> of <st data-num="05178" class="">bronze</st>, and you are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="07568" class="">network</st> <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="05178" class="">bronze</st> <st data-num="02885" class="">rings</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> its <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="07098" class="">corners</st>.

You are to <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> it <st data-num="08478" class="">under</st> the <st data-num="03749" class="">ledge</st> of the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st> <st data-num="04295" class="">below</st>, so that the <st data-num="07568" class="">network</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">come</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="02677" class="">halfway</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">up</st> the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st>.<n id="2" />

You are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> <st data-num="0905" class="">poles</st> for the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st>, <st data-num="0905" class="">poles</st> of <st data-num="07848" class="">acacia</st> <st data-num="06086" class="">wood</st>, and you are to <st data-num="06823" class="">overlay</st> them with <st data-num="05178" class="">bronze</st>.

The <st data-num="0905" class="">poles</st> are to be <st data-num="0935" class="">put</st><n id="1" /> into the <st data-num="02885" class="">rings</st> so that the <st data-num="0905" class="">poles</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="06763" class="">sides</st> of the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st> when <st data-num="05375" class="">carrying</st> it.<n id="2" />
You are to make the altar hollow, out of boards. Just as it was shown you on the mountain, so they must make it.
“You are to make the courtyard of the tabernacle. For the south side there are to be hangings for the courtyard of fine twisted linen, 150 feet long for one side,

with<n id="1" /> <st data-num="06242" class="">20</st> <st data-num="05982" class="">posts</st> and their <st data-num="06242" class="">20</st> <st data-num="05178" class="">bronze</st> <st data-num="0134" class="">bases</st>, with the <st data-num="02053" class="">hooks</st> of the <st data-num="05982" class="">posts</st> and their <st data-num="02838" class="">bands</st> of <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st>.

<st data-num="03651" class="">Likewise</st><n id="1" /> for its <st data-num="0753" class="">length</st> on the <st data-num="06828" class="">north</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st>, there are to be<n id="2" /> <st data-num="07050" class="">hangings</st> <st data-num="0753" class="">for</st> <st data-num="03967" class="">150 feet</st>, with <st data-num="06242" class="">20</st> <st data-num="05982" class="">posts</st> and their <st data-num="06242" class="">20</st> <st data-num="05178" class="">bronze</st> <st data-num="0134" class="">bases</st>, with <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="02053" class="">hooks</st> and <st data-num="02838" class="">bands</st><n id="3" /> on the <st data-num="05982" class="">posts</st>.

The <st data-num="07341" class="">width</st> of the <st data-num="02691" class="">court</st> on the <st data-num="03220" class="">west</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st> is to be <st data-num="02572 0520" class="">75 feet</st> with <st data-num="07050" class="">hangings</st>, with their <st data-num="06235" class="">10</st> <st data-num="05982" class="">posts</st> and their <st data-num="06235" class="">10</st> <st data-num="0134" class="">bases</st>.

The <st data-num="07341" class="">width</st> of the <st data-num="02691" class="">court</st> on the <st data-num="06924" class="">east</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st>, toward the <st data-num="04217" class="">sunrise</st>, is to be <st data-num="02572 0520" class="">75 feet</st>.

The <st data-num="07050" class="">hangings</st> on one <st data-num="03802" class="">side</st><n id="1" /> of the gate are to be<n id="2" /> <st data-num="02568 06240 0520" class="">22½ feet long</st>, with their <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> <st data-num="05982" class="">posts</st> and their <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> <st data-num="0134" class="">bases</st>.

On the <st data-num="08145" class="">second</st> <st data-num="03802" class="">side</st><n id="1" /> there are to be<n id="2" /> <st data-num="07050" class="">hangings</st> <st data-num="02568 06240" class="">22½ feet long</st>, with their <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> <st data-num="05982" class="">posts</st> and their <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> <st data-num="0134" class="">bases</st>.

For the <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> of the <st data-num="02691" class="">courtyard</st> there is to be a <st data-num="04539" class="">curtain</st> of <st data-num="06242 0520" class="">30 feet</st>, of <st data-num="08504" class="">blue</st>, <st data-num="0713" class="">purple</st>, and <st data-num="08438 08144" class="">scarlet yarn</st> and <st data-num="08336">fine</st> <st data-num="07806" class="">twisted</st> <st data-num="08336" class="">linen</st>, the <st data-num="04639" class="">work</st> of an <st data-num="07551" class="">embroiderer</st>, with <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="05982" class="">posts</st> and their <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="0134" class="">bases</st>.

<st data-num="03605" class="">All</st> the <st data-num="05982" class="">posts</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">around</st> the <st data-num="02691" class="">courtyard</st> are to have <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="02836" class="">bands</st>;<n id="1" /> their <st data-num="02053" class="">hooks</st> are to be<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st>, and their <st data-num="0134" class="">bases</st> <st data-num="05178" class="">bronze</st>.

The <st data-num="0753" class="">length</st> of the <st data-num="02691" class="">courtyard</st> is to be <st data-num="03967 0520" class="">150 feet</st><n id="1" /> and the <st data-num="07341" class="">width</st> <st data-num="02572" class="">75 feet</st>,<n id="2" /> and the <st data-num="06967" class="">height</st> of the <st data-num="08336">fine</st> <st data-num="07806" class="">twisted</st> <st data-num="08336" class="">linen</st> hangings<n id="3" /> is to be<n id="4" /> <st data-num="02568 0520" class="">7½ feet</st>, with their <st data-num="05178" class="">bronze</st> <st data-num="0134" class="">bases</st>.
All the utensils of the tabernacle used in all its service, all its tent pegs, and all the tent pegs of the courtyard are to be made of bronze.
“You are to command the Israelites that they bring to you pure oil of pressed olives for the light, so that the lamps will burn regularly.

In the tent of meeting outside the curtain that is before the testimony, Aaron and his sons are to arrange it from evening to morning before the Lord. This is to be a lasting ordinance among the Israelites for generations to come.
